bibdata.title: American National Standard for the Performance of Checkpoint Cabinet X-Ray Imaging Security Systems
American National Standard for the Performance of Checkpoint Cabinet X-Ray Imaging Security Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document establishes standards for the technical performance of cabinet X-ray imaging systems used for screening at security checkpoints and other inspection venues.
Standards for the technical performance of cabinet x-ray imaging systems used for screening at security checkpoints and other inspection venues are established by this document.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
